page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ---
page.content:
Mr.Barry Tweats is District Secretary of the National Farmers'Union.The day in his life is Friday,May 10th,1985.
{What time did you start work? I arrived at the office at about 08.30. {What did you do first? I opened and looked through the morning post.Ithen took items of post that were for me personally,then Julie and Emma,my secretaries,took theirs.I dealt with telephone calls at approximately 09.30. Then Mr. Geoff Oliver,the General Inspector from the N.F.U.Mutual Insurance Society,arrived at the office. { Why had Mr.Oliver come? He spends a day with me once a week to deal with specific insurance matters.
